story_08_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, that was an easy win!
All right, old man, make with the badge.
story_08_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
No. Pryce wasn’t really giving it his all
in that battle.
story_08_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmph. There was certainly something dazzling
about your teamwork.
story_08_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: But can’t you give just a bit more?
story_08_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
What are you talking about?!
What’s the deal here?!
story_08_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In the battle with Pryce just now, you did perform
well, but there was still something missing.
story_08_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Think hard about it, you two. You’ll need to find
the answer before we meet Pryce again.
